channel.title: Ruined my server, please help me!
channel.description:
Hello, I was doing something on the server, then I took an hour break. When I came back, I started the server, went to a bank and tried opening it and it wouldnt let me. I got this error in console:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 32767 at org.dementhium.model.definition.ItemDefinition.forId(ItemDefinition.j ava:134) at org.dementhium.model.Item.getDefinition(Item.java:35) at org.dementhium.net.ActionSender.sendItems(ActionSender.java:1284) at org.dementhium.model.player.Bank.openBank(Bank.java:33) at org.dementhium.net.packethandlers.NpcOption$4.execute(NpcOption.java: 397) at org.dementhium.model.World$2.execute(World.java:341) at org.dementhium.tickable.Tick.run(Tick.java:25) at org.dementhium.model.Mob.processTicks(Mob.java:514) at org.dementhium.task.impl.PlayerTickTask.execute(PlayerTickTask.java:2 6) at org.dementhium.task.SequentialTaskExecutor.performTasks(SequentialTas kExecutor.java:13) at org.dementhium.model.World.run(World.java:174) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:47 1) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRunAndReset(FutureTask.java :351) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(FutureTask.java:178) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask. access$301(ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.java:178) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask. run(ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.java:293) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor. java:1110) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor .java:603) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:729)
Please help me :/ By the way, this is [size=18pt]639[/size]
Edit: If i try with a regular account, the bank is empty and you can put stuff in it

item.title: Ruined my server, please help me!
item.dc:creator: @Nookumdip Nookumdip
item.description:
@Nookumdip wrote:

Deleted all accounts, seems to work fine now.

Read full topic
item.source: Ruined my server, please help me!

item.title: Ruined my server, please help me!
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

there is an item with too high or low of an ID in the player’s bank.
Thats what its giving you the out of bounds error

To fix it, you need to delete the player file.

Read full topic
item.source: Ruined my server, please help me!

item.title: Ruined my server, please help me!
item.dc:creator: @Spencer4678 Spencer4678
item.description:
@Spencer4678 wrote:

Your account’s bank might be corrupted. Possibly try reseting the bank items in the player’s file?

Read full topic
item.source: Ruined my server, please help me!

Hello, I was doing something on the server, then I took an hour break.
When I came back, I started the server, went to a bank and tried opening it and it wouldnt let me.
